book.title: Gentoo/ALT Testing Docs
book.abstract: Documents related to Gentoo/ALT testing, including procedures and AT application process.

part.title: Gentoo/ALT Testing Docs
part.abstract: Provides testing documentation for Gentoo/ALT users.

chapter.title: Gentoo/ALT Arch Testers
chapter.abstract: Explains what arch testing involves and how it relates to core Gentoo/AMD64 efforts.
